Class PaginatedGui

    @NonnullByDefault
public class PaginatedGui
extends Gui
    Extension of Gui which automatically paginates Items.

      • redraw

        public void redraw()
        Description copied from class: Gui
        Places items on the GUI. Called when the GUI is opened. Use Gui.isFirstDraw() to determine if this is the first time redraw has been called.
